articles.title: IIT-Madras eyes global top 50 with major expansion plans
creator: Manash Pratim Gohain
articles.description: IIT-Madras is contemplating establishing a medical college to potentially elevate its global ranking and foster interdisciplinary research, according to Director V Kamakoti. The institution is also planning global research centers in Dubai, Malaysia, and Germany, alongside a sustainability campus in Puducherry, to enhance its international presence and address global challenges.

articles.title: Anjali Sharma, who is now known as Yahhve Sharma, says her offbeat name sets off a conversation every time she meets someone
creator: Nonika Singh
articles.description: Anjali Sharma, now Yahhve Sharma, changed her name for visibility, finding it a conversation starter. Her recent roles include "Chall Kapat: The Deception" and upcoming "Section 108." She values learning from co-stars like Shriya Pilgaonkar and Nawazuddin Siddiqui, and embraces her journey as an outsider, motivated by her passion.

articles.title: Marion and Guillaume SPLIT after 2 decades
articles.description: French movie star Marion Cotillard and director Guillaume Canet have separated after nearly two decades together with "mutual respect", the star couple announced on Friday. "After 18 years together, Marion Cotillard and Guillaume Canet have decided to separate by mutual agreement," said a statement released by their representatives.
